pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive 3D Visualization of Molecular Structures // Provides an 'htmlwidgets' https://www.htmlwidgets.org/ interface to 'NGL.js' http://nglviewer.org/ngl/api/. 'NGLvieweR' can be used to visualize and interact with protein databank ('PDB') and structural files in R and Shiny applications. It includes a set of API functions to manipulate the viewer after creation in Shiny.
